Welcome to the world of
PLANTS

We are a nursery specialising in high value plants which includes Dragon Fruit plants, herbal plant, fruit & ornamental trees, and scented flowering plants. Did you know that Dragon Fruit plants - a cactus plant bears fruits and are edible and tasty!

Providing you a variety of
HIGH VALUE PLANTS

We are supplying potential high value plants which you can use as ornamental plant for decoration or use as a daily supplement for staying healthy.

P&B Greenery takes pride in promoting green revolution by providing high value quality plants suited for our climate, and knowledgeable advice when it comes to using those plants for either decoration or for healthy consumptions that comes from years of gardening experience.
